name.baseName: Lithium Carbonate Production ; Battery Grade Lithium Carbonate ; Precipitation ; Concentrated Brine from Cauchari Salt Lake, Argentina
碳酸锂生产 ; 电池级碳酸锂 ; 沉淀法 ; 阿根廷考查里盐湖高浓卤水

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The future supply routes reviewed in this study are based on data gathered from technical reports and environmental impact assessment reports of several lithium mining and processing companies (Lithium Americas Corp., Minera Salar Blanco, Nemaska Lithium Inc., and Keliber Oy) that are at various stages of developing their lithium assets. These are considered future supply routes as they are not yet active but areexpected to be operational in 5–10 years. The lower lithium concentrations at these brine-based sources also reflect the possible future lithium grades of current supply routes from brines, whose lithium concentrations will likely decrease over the years due to extraction

本研究审查的未来供应路线是基于从几家锂矿开采和加工公司（Lithium Americas Corp.、Minera Salar Blanco、Nemaska Lithium Inc.和Keliber Oy）的技术报告和环境影响评估报告中收集的数据，这些公司的锂资产正处于不同的开发阶段。这些锂资产正处于不同的开发阶段。预计在 5-10 年内投入运营。这些以卤水为基础的来源的锂浓度较低，也反映了当前供应路线中卤水的未来锂品位。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The brine-based future supply routes for production of LiOH⋅H2O are similar to the current supply routes and represent operations at Salar de Cauchari, Argentina and Salar de Maricunga, Chile. These are two other locations within the “lithium triangle”, where considerable lithium reserves exist. The average lithium concentrations at Cauchari and Maricunga are 0.05% and 0.09%, respectively. This influences the energy and chemical use, and to some extent the technical process designs at these facilities. The process information for the brine extraction operations in Salar de Cauchari was gathered from several technical reports prepared for Lithium Americas Corporation (Burga et al., 2020; Worley Parsons, 2011). Similarly, process information for operations in the Salar de Maricunga was derived from technical reports prepared for Minera Salar Blanco (Atacama Water Consultants, 2022). When impacts from these future supply datasets for the brine route were calculated for comparative purposes, data from the specific reviewed sources were used until Li2CO3 production.

基于卤水的未来锂OH⋅H2O 生产供应路线与当前供应路线类似，代表了阿根廷考查里盐湖和智利马里孔加盐湖的运营情况。这两个地方位于 "锂三角"，锂储量可观。考查里盐湖和马里昆加盐湖的平均锂浓度分别为 0.05% 和 0.09%。这影响了能源和化学品的使用，并在一定程度上影响了这些设施的技术工艺设计。Salar de Cauchari 盐湖卤水提取作业的工艺信息来自为美洲锂业公司（Lithium Americas Corporation）编写的几份技术报告（Burga 等人，2020 年；Worley Parsons，2011 年）。同样，马里孔加盐湖的开采工艺信息也来自为 Minera Salar Blanco 公司编写的技术报告（Atacama Water Consultants, 2022）。在计算这些未来供应数据集对盐水路线的影响以进行比较时，使用了特定审查来源的数据，直至生产出 Li2CO3。在该步骤之后，
technology.technologicalApplicability: Battery grade lithium carbonate produced through the precipitation method from the concentrated brine of Cauchari Salt Lake, Argentina, is utilized for the manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries. This high-purity lithium carbonate is a crucial material in the production of cathodes for rechargeable lithium batteries, which are employed in a wide range of electronics such as smartphones, laptops, and electric vehicles.
使用阿根廷考查里盐湖高浓卤水通过沉淀法生产的电池级碳酸锂，用于制造锂离子电池。这种高纯度的碳酸锂是生产可充电锂电池阴极的关键材料，广泛应用于智能手机、笔记本电脑和电动汽车等一系列电子产品。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Chordia, M., Wickerts, S., Nordelöf, A. & Arvidsson, R. Life cycle environmental impacts of current and future battery-grade lithium supply from brine and spodumene. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 187, 106634 (2022).

Chordia, M., Wickerts, S., Nordelöf, A. & Arvidsson, R. Life cycle environmental impacts of current and future battery-grade lithium supply from brine and spodumene. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 187, 106634 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set, it is important to note that the production processes for the raw materials and minor energy flows contributing less than 1% are not accounted for. Therefore, users should include additional data or use proxy data to account for these inputs if conducting a comprehensive life cycle assessment. Users must also be aware that this data is specific to the precipitation method in the context of the Cauchari Salt Lake and may not be applicable for lithium carbonate produced by other processes or from different sources.
使用此数据集时，需注意原材料的生产流程和贡献比小于1%的能源流未被包括在内。因此，如果进行全面的生命周期评估，用户应加入额外数据或使用代理数据来计算这些输入。用户还必须意识到这些数据是特定于考查里盐湖背景下的沉淀法，并且可能不适用于通过其他过程或不同来源生产的碳酸锂。

completeness.common:other: The production processes for raw materials and energy flows with very small amounts (less than 1%) are not included.
原材料的生产流程和极少量（小于 1%）的能源流未包括在内。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
